channel.title: Hitmarkers - deathlypvpzv3
channel.description: I already used google to try and find a tut to adding hitmarker splats but i cant find anything. Base is deathlypvpzv3 and only numbers show up no red or blue background When i used to work on servers was when silab was around so i never really messed with clients. I know it has to be added as a sprite but now the coding so that sprite is loaded when needed is my problem. Can anyone either explain what class (server/client/both) would i need to edit/add to to make this show up or please direct me to a tutorial on how to do this? Thanks!

item.title: Hitmarkers - deathlypvpzv3
item.dc:creator: @Processing Processing
item.description:
@Processing wrote:

I already used google to try and find a tut to adding hitmarker splats but i cant find anything. Base is deathlypvpzv3 and only numbers show up no red or blue background When i used to work on servers was when silab was around so i never really messed with clients. I know it has to be added as a sprite but now the coding so that sprite is loaded when needed is my problem. Can anyone either explain what class (server/client/both) would i need to edit/add to to make this show up or please direct me to a tutorial on how to do this? Thanks!
